title: It's Mid-Summer!
content:
Welcome back from the holidays! We hope you had a restful break.

As you settle back into learning, remember to:
- Stay hydrated in the summer heat
- Take regular breaks
- Review your goals for the term ahead

title: Year 7 Science - Forces Updated
content:
The Year 7 Science Forces topic has been updated with new quiz questions and improved explanations.

Key changes:
- Added 15 new multiple choice questions
- Improved diagrams for friction concepts
- New cloze activities for Newton's Laws
